thread.title: Darren Carter
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Darren Carter

author: Darren Carter
title: Darren Carter
text:
I have a jaguar xf, it normally costs a lot more for a service. But servicing stop gave me a great discount and I booked it. I thought is was too good to be true. I decided I wanted to drop the car off for myself to the local garage, they were great they done a full service and an MOT.
Then it was time to pay, That was straight forward and they even asked me if I wanted to book in next years service and MOT at the same discounted rate as this service.
What can I say, All booked in for next year, Great experience and a great company.
